parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPS system can cause a sudden loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The power steering assist system fails
the steering becomes difficult to turn
the steering locks or becomes stuck
the vehicle is hard to steer
the steering system suddenly recovers after a brief failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic throttle body can cause sudden loss of power, unintended acceleration, or failure to respond to braking, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power
unintended acceleration
failure to respond to braking
vehicle surges forward
RPMs increase unexpectedly
inability to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The throttle body defect can cause the vehicle to hesitate or stall, leading to a loss of power and acceleration, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or stalls
the accelerator ceases to function
the vehicle loses power and cannot accelerate
warning lights and messages appear
such as "STOP SAFELY NOW".

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the loss of brakes, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at higher speeds.
symptoms: The ABS system turns off
the "Regen Brake Failure" warning appears
the brake pedal feels soft or goes to the floor
pumping the brake pedal does not help
and the vehicle may continue to move forward even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake booster can cause the loss of brakes, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at higher speeds.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or goes to the floor
pumping the brake pedal does not help
and the vehicle may continue to move forward even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the vacuum pump/hose assembly can cause the loss of brakes, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when driving at higher speeds.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or goes to the floor
pumping the brake pedal does not help
and the vehicle may continue to move forward even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic throttle body can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to a loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
the "wrench" fault indicator on the dashboard illuminates
the vehicle's throttle control is lost
the vehicle's speed is unpredictable
the vehicle's acceleration is unpredictable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The warning lights on the dashboard come on
the brakes fail
the vehicle is unable to stop or slow down
the vehicle's stability is compromised.
